text: Jisas naŋga nuŋandɨ sɨmbɨrasara haŋɨnɨŋ Jerusalem yɨvurahɨrɨmɨndɨhu arɨñɨndɨmi. Kamata Apu Oliv tamayɨ yahuta pɨhu Betfage yɨvurahamu. Kamata Jisas sɨmbɨrasara arɨkimbatɨŋ sɨmbɨta nɨmavami, Pɨhu kututa ŋgarɨŋ ndañɨ umara. Uta sɨkwɨtaya ŋgɨtɨra donki mu siki tɨmburamɨtu kɨyɨmandɨ, ñɨŋi nuŋandɨ handahara nu naŋga kɨhɨrɨ kɨyɨmandɨ. Siki ha kuyɨvata arɨkita yi kɨyɨman nɨñɨ tɨmbuta payɨmara.
